verses.name: Leviticus 11:23
verses.text: But all other flying creeping things, which have four feet, shall be an abomination unto you.

verses.name: Leviticus 11:24
verses.text: And for these ye shall be unclean: whosoever toucheth the carcase of them shall be unclean until the even.

verses.name: Leviticus 11:25
verses.text: And whosoever beareth ought of the carcase of them shall wash his clothes, and be unclean until the even.

verses.name: Leviticus 11:26
verses.text: The carcases of every beast which divideth the hoof, and is not clovenfooted, nor cheweth the cud, are unclean unto you: every one that toucheth them shall be unclean.
